name: ApnaCashback
overview:
A new shopping reward website, first of its kind in India, promises to pay millions of online shoppers real cash for shopping. The site, www.ApnaCashBack.com, is the first and only website in India to give hard cash rewards to customers for making online purchases.

Every time a shopper buys or shops from any of the stores partnering with ApnaCashBack, they get a percentage of the sale price back in cash. The cashback can vary from 1% to 15% depending on the store.

Apnacashback.com allows users to shop almost any product or service, ranging from flight tickets, travel packages, gifts, dating, matrimonial, computers, software etc. from various partners and pay cash back to them.
